computedFields.label: Age Calculated

computedFields.name: PTB_Bin
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'RecordTypeId.Name' == "Cross/Up-sell Intelligence" then (case when 'Order_Quantity' > 0 or 'PTB_Segment_Numeric' <= 1 then "1" when 'Order_Quantity' == 0 and 'PTB_Segment_Numeric' >= 2 and 'PTB_Segment_Numeric' <= 3 then "2" else "3" end) else (case when 'PTB_Segment_Numeric' <= 1 then "1" when 'PTB_Segment_Numeric' >= 2 and 'PTB_Segment_Numeric' <= 3 then "2" else "3" end) end
computedFields.label: PTB Bin
